Abstract_en_ca_s: Chronic bronchitis is long-term swelling and the buildup of mucus in the airways of your lungs. The airways (bronchial tubes) get inflamed and make a lot of mucus. This can narrow or block the airways, making it hard for you to breathe. It is a form of COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease). Chronic bronchitis is...
Abstract_en_us_s: Chronic bronchitis is long-term swelling and the buildup of mucus in the airways of your lungs. The airways (bronchial tubes) get inflamed and make a lot of mucus. This can narrow or block the airways, making it hard for you to breathe. It is a form of COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease). Chronic bronchitis is...
Abstract_es_us_s: La bronquitis crónica es la inflamación y la acumulación de mucosidad crónicas en las vías respiratorias de los pulmones. Las vías respiratorias (bronquios) se inflaman y producen mucha mucosidad. Esto puede estrechar o bloquear las vías respiratorias, dificultándole la respiración. Es una forma de EPOC (enfermedad...
